commit.message:
module.c (use_iso_fortran_env_module): Fix standard check.

2010-04-08  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>

        * module.c (use_iso_fortran_env_module): Fix standard check.

2010-04-08  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>

        * gfortran.dg/iso_fortran_env_6.f90: Add more checks.

From-SVN: r158129
